website_summaries.verdict: The Timberland Adventure 2.0 Cupsole Alpine Oxford is a functional kick that exudes a streamlined sneaker look with an outdoorsy vibe thanks to the metal eyelets and rope laces. The shoe features a combination of an anti-fatigue footbed and extra padded collar and tongue to provide excellent comfort ideal for all-day wear.Moreover, the use of recycled materials on this shoe could benefit not only the user but also the environment.
pros: Majority of the reviewers found the Timberland Adventure 2.0 Cupsole Alpine Oxford to be very comfortable
The lightness of this pair has been commended a couple of times in the reviews
This pair runs true to size, according to the higher number of purchasers
Some consumers loved the fact that the kick they received looked exactly like the photos online
It is available in a wide variety of colorways
Most wearers admired the shoe's stylish design, which some added that it is casual yet classy and luxurious
A lot of consumers were delighted that they could easily match this pair with any casual ensemble and also dress it up for special occasions
Some shoe users were happy that they receive compliments every time they wear it out
A good number of reviewers accredited the pair to be an excellent product with great value for its price
cons: Several shoe users disclosed that the kick is a bit too stiff and tends to chafe the back of the ankle
A few wearers said that the outsole wore out quite quickly
One reviewer said that his shoe’s color bled onto his pants

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was happy with product but after 12 months and very little wear, they have split where the two pieces of material are joined around the ankle. Never experienced this on any brand of shoe before. I was giving Timberland one final chance after reading adverse reviews on their diminishing quality but sadly, have to agree and will not be a customer going forwards.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, comfortable, well made
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box a very attractive shoe. Works well with both casual and smarter atire. I walked around 100 miles (fitbit) within the first fortnite as I was on holiday and they still looked new thanks to the quality of Timberland.
customer_reviews.author: Forest

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality as they should be from Timberland. One of the pair had a slight scuff mark on the toe but not enough to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mart

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift and wasn't disappointed. Look great and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch the ridge
customer_reviews.text: These have a ridge on the heel which is a bit niggly, I have had anothe pair for years but this newer model isn’t as good.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a bit larger than expected. Good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and look
customer_reviews.text: Comfy smart looking trainers my 2nd pair highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a decent price. Delivered on time. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Timberlands at over half price was something that couldn’t be missed, comfy and look good too
customer_reviews.author: Ben noble

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shoes, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these, arrived as expected. Fit well, no rubbing on my heels. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Khamnei

customer_reviews.title: Shoeeeees!
customer_reviews.text: Nice item and very comfortable and a tenner cheaper than the Timberland outlet!
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Alldis

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of trainers fit well and seem to be lasting
customer_reviews.author: Blackie

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: It is the second time i am ordering the item and i am as pleased as the first time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Romeo Iconaru

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe and has an amazing feel. Definitely a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kibombwe

customer_reviews.title: Timberland shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain at half price, wish they hadn’t been discontinued
customer_reviews.author: femery1231

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. Order your exact size, after a few wears it will fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Olimpiu Pamp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived very fast and in excellent condition. Lovely shoes and very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I didn’t expect much but this was great deal and an all great comfortable show. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Dihan

product_meta.title: Timberland Men's Adventure 2.0 Cupsole Alpine Oxford Low-top Sneakers
